website_summaries.verdict: These nonstick sheets clean up easily and nest together to save cabinet space.
pros: Long-lasting sheets made from durable carbon steel
cons: Water can seep inside through the silicone handle pieces, causing the pan to rust
Do not use with cooking spray

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait before I wrote my review...i bought these in September so here goes....dont waste another dime on anything but stainless steel....i always bake with parchment paper and the parts that weren't covered turned dark brown, you can't get it off! The orange rubber thingys on the handles keep coming off....the high reviews are either because they received the products free or discounted OR I received some sort of knock off. And it makes no difference to hand wash or use the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Warps, Weak Coating, Looses Non-Stick
customer_reviews.text: I've only used the smaller pan six times. The inset silicone handles turned from a bright orange to a yucky brown. The non-stick coating worked well the first two times, but seems to have oxidized and turned brownish. The coating has started to turn brown on the back and chip off. The pan has only been hand washed. Lastly, they immediately warp as soon as they get hot.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Pans leak rusty water from silicon handles after washing.
customer_reviews.text: These are the most annoying pans I have ever owned. They come with an added "feature" of holding rusty water in a hidden compartment. Every time I pull them out of the diswasher, rusty water comes out from the silicon handles leaves an ugly brown water spots everywhere in the kitchen. I guess those people giving these 5 stars don't wash their pans.
customer_reviews.author: Ck

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Waste your Money!
customer_reviews.text: Is this product serious? I was so excited for these baking sheets. First time using them I placed the small one in the oven, 2 minutes later.. seriously only 2 min. I heard a noise and looked into the oven to see my brand new baking sheet completely warped!!!!! Can’t anyone put out a decent product anymore instead of trying to rip people off!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Hasser

customer_reviews.title: We've had these for about 6 months. The largest ...
customer_reviews.text: We've had these for about 6 months. The largest of the 3 pieces bends when used under normal heat. It comes back to its normal shape when it cools. It did this from the beginning, although it took us a while to use it and discover the problem. Also, when hand-washed, color drips from the orange plastic on the side, and the colored water has a metallic smell.
customer_reviews.author: yan

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I bought these Feb 2017, it is now Sept 2017. Long story short, the non-stick coating is peeling off and sticking to the food. Yuck...keep shopping!
customer_reviews.author: S. HYANS

customer_reviews.title: Won’t last longer then a month. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these! We bought these and after the first use we saw things start to stick. It’s now been a month of use and the food always sticks. This last time using one of them, food was baked on, so we tried soaking the pan and the food still wouldn’t come off. We used the sponge and still wouldn’t come off. We finally starting to use the scrubby part of the sponge and then the coating start to come off! They feel heavy and sturdy. I thought they were going to be awesome. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jyllian Long

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: We bought these in May 2018 for June gift. Was a mistake. First, the orange handles ARE NOT like the silicon cooking materials. They get just as hot as the pans. Easy to burn yourself the first time. Next, after about a year they start sticking. A real pain. A waste of money actually. Unless we need the deep sides, we use old cookie sheets with low sides and a piece of parchment paper - works better than these sheets by far. These wee a bust!
customer_reviews.author: Lee. Heiman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Pans
customer_reviews.text: Best pans I've ever owned. Not a premature review. I bought these in 2016 and use them all the time. They look as good now as they did then. No sticking, No warping, No stains. Never lost an orange grip. Just easy cleaning non stick pans. I've seen some negative reviews and maybe there are some defective ones. Its Amazon you have like 90 days to send them back if you don't like them obviously most do or the rating wouldn't be so high.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent nonstick for baking salmon and potatoes
customer_reviews.text: These pans have performed admirably. I have baked with them regularly for 2.5 months. A principal use has been for baking salmon filets at 425 degrees for 15-20 minutes with the skin side down. Also, for baking oiled and seasoned potato slices. I hand wash the pans with nothing but some dish detergent and a sponge. The pans have been COMPLETELY nonstick. With regard to warping, each pan warped the first time or two I used them, but none have done so subsequently during repeated use.
customer_reviews.author: Average Consumer

customer_reviews.title: It really doesn't stick! WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I returned a similar pan set on eBay because everything got stuck, this one doesn't, which is perfect! You have to make sure this is the required size for you, because it's not a full size pan the size of a conventional oven, however, it is large enough to fit any portion we ever need. Comparing with couple others we have, it is more solid and feels heavy duty. The most important thing about it - we used it about 30 times since we purchase it and we didn't have to to scrub it even once. A simple wash with a dish washing soap and it's ready for the next use. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: NivNiv

customer_reviews.title: Rusting bad so soon...
customer_reviews.text: Since the first wash in the dishwasher, all 3 of the sheets leak water from the underneath of the pan. The water on the floor where it has dripped looks like swamp water. Clearly a mix with the metal under the pans non stick coating and the water from the dishwasher... it smells like a mix of rust and copper. It’s a very dirty green color.... I’m extremely disappointed in these. The underneath of the largest pan is already getting rust spots and it’s only been washed about 5 times.
customer_reviews.author: Brynn Sherry

customer_reviews.title: You BETTER get this!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worth the $30 I think that’s how much we paid for it! We do a lot of cooking and baking and these cake in handy. Easy to use and easy clean up. Nothing sticks to the pan just slides right off lol unbelievable. I’m not a fan of washing dishes!! So the easier the better make life simple for me. It’s already hard enough trying survive lol m Have a good one on purpose!
customer_reviews.author: ChUzi

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic - coming from a horrible baker
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a strong cook. I told my husband of 5 years this in advance. There are plenty of nights that he comes home from work at 8 and wants to know what is for dinner and I just look at him. What I am good at is cleaning (I blame this on my hate to cook bc it’s just too messy). These are the first pans (I also bought the cake pans) that I can legit clean in the sink in less than 20 seconds and store back under the stove (old life had me putting in dishwasher which took up so much room). Buy these for the essential non cook in your life!
customer_reviews.author: MomtoAlex

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT Pans
customer_reviews.text: I got them a couple of weeks ago and have used them for making pizza, heating bread, cooking root veggies. I can see Christmas cookies baking on these in December....because everything just slides off these pans. They do not recommend dishwasher cleaning, but washing by hand took moments. So nice having the silicone grips too. It sure helps when you are using oven gloves to pull them from the oven. The three sizes are so nice to have. I'm alone so most of the time I'll use the small one. But when I am cooking for company I have used all three! They come in other colors (the silicone part) too.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Good so Far
customer_reviews.text: I have used all of these baking sheets for the past months, mostly for baking cookies during COVID-19 lockdown. I love the colored handles on each side of the baking sheet, easy to grab to put and take the sheets out of the oven. The sheets seem to heat evenly when making cookies. Also, nothing has burned or gotten too brown. The sheets wash well and it is nice to have three different sizes. My favorite is the largest one, it holds a lot. I may have to find another (single) large Rachael Ray Bakesheet to purchase next!
customer_reviews.author: KMD

customer_reviews.title: I love Rachael Ray and all her products
customer_reviews.text: I love Rachael Ray and all her products, but I have to be honest. These sheets have been such a disappointment because at 400 degrees they all bend. When baking this ruins all the items in the oven that must bake evenly. Originally I thought I was setting the oven too high but not the case. They say oven safe until 450 degrees. This also happens immediately while trying to use the broiler on high or low.
customer_reviews.author: Eric G.

customer_reviews.title: Warp in the Oven
customer_reviews.text: Every time I bake with these cookie sheets, they make a loud banging noise and then they are warped when I take them out. It twists a little so that two opposite corners are up in the air. So far, they've always flattened back out. It hasn't caused an issue while cooking/baking, but I can see how it could with the pan sitting at an angle.
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, lighweight, and super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Better that expected. My wife was disappointed with this Mother's Day gift, but I told her that it comes with dinner out! She's not disappointed any more. These are perfect for baking jobs that used to be impossible to clean up (usually my job). A good test is my wife's delicious baked/broiled favorites such as oven roasted root veggies, cabbage, Brussels sprouts with generous spices and olive oil (we're vegetarian). These are strong, light weight, and attractive. Oily baked on oven mess (45 minutes at 435 degrees) comes off easily with warm soapy water and a sponge. I'm sure they'll be just as good for meat based food and cookies. Be aware that they are not deep enough for casseroles.
customer_reviews.author: Wings42

customer_reviews.title: Bakes Beautifully
customer_reviews.text: I had to bake 1000 cookies the xmas for a charity event and I ordered these and another popular celebrity brand, I have to say there really was a difference the cookies all homemade baked very differently on the 2 different brands. Rachael Ray brand was superior. Clean up literally was wiping the pan. I totally recommend this set it did not fail!
customer_reviews.author: VICTORIA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Set
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect set. It has every size I use. I hand washed and hand dried them per the cleaning instructions and used one the same day I received them. It did not bend or warp while in the oven, and the dinner I cooked did not burn or overcook. After dinner, I hand washed and hand dried it again. They are not meant to go in the dishwasher or meant to soak. I know I am going to enjoy these for quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Burns

customer_reviews.title: I have only used it a few times and was very disappointed to see this
customer_reviews.text: The large one is already scratched with the surface coming off. I have only used it a few times and was very disappointed to see this. I have purchased these before and they lasted much longer than a few uses. I do not place them in the dishwasher or use cooking spray on them either so I'm not sure if mine was defective or what.
customer_reviews.author: Klm2611

customer_reviews.title: Best pans ever!
customer_reviews.text: I was so frustrated with cleaning some slightly cheaper Farberware pans, I went ahead and donated them. I decided to try the Rachel Ray pans and they are great. Chicken wings are the toughest to clean up after, and these make it easy. The non-stick coating is obviously thick and should last. I am not sure about the rubber insert because it still gets hot, but it does provide grip when cool to touch. Very pleased with my purchase. And we have used all three in the set.
customer_reviews.author: mike faler

customer_reviews.title: Ingnore the bad reviews if your a pro with cookie sheets.
customer_reviews.text: What on earth are all these bad reviews? Used mine 6 times on 425. No warping. Quick cooling, wipes easy with a paper towel and a soapy rag, rinse, dry with a rag well. Replace. Literally 30 seconds of time. No cooking spray needed. Why would anyone dishwash these? You literally do not have to.
customer_reviews.author: Sara B.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stick, slightly stains
customer_reviews.text: I love love love love Rachael Ray non-stick cookware because they actually are non-stick at bargain prices. These items are very durable in the sense that they feel very thick and sturdy. After a couple months of use, there has been some staining to the metal from use, but it's still non-stick. I personally don't care about the blemishes, as my aesthetic is pretty organic and earthy. I'm happy they function.
customer_reviews.author: Wimpy

customer_reviews.title: Do recommend !
customer_reviews.text: I had a cheap $2 Walmart pan before this set. It’s a huge upgrade!! I like having three different sizes to choose from. The pans are very slick and easy to clean for me. My only issue has been I expected that it would be more sturdy in the oven than my old ones. By that I mean when the stove gets hot you can hear the pan kind of bow out to when it’s not exactly level on the rack. When it cools down it goes back to regular shape. Other than that these pans have been great.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: The baking sheets emitted weird smell and fumes!
customer_reviews.text: When I used the medium and big size banking sheets in the oven (350F) and some weird smell emitted from the oven. When I opened the oven, I saw smoke and fumes emitted from the baking sheet! I had to immediately open all the windows in my apartment! The also warp when heated. I won't use them again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Would’ve given these 5 starts but..... when I put them in the dish washer and take them out, brown liquid comes out. So then I have to rewash. Love how these are heavy and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: NOT heavy duty baking pans at all
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed the first time I put one of these baking sheets into the oven loaded with food. The pan warped and twisted and all the liquid spilled to one end. Not heavy duty baking material at all. I thought since they were twice the price of others offered that they would be twice as good. They are not.
customer_reviews.author: longtallsam

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Awful sheet pans! They get all warped once heated. I used mine once and when I set it in the stove top it was all wobbly and wouldn’t sit flat. Awful awful product, Rachael Ray should be ashamed to have her name on this!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good. Disappointed in how it morphs when hot.
customer_reviews.text: These are great pans! Clean very easily!! The grip is a huge plus The biggest issue I’ve had, is the tray bottom, when it gets hot, morphs. Like, when I set it down on a flat surface, one side is high off the flat surface and the other side is flat down. It eventually flattens when it cools, but that doesn’t make up for the fact that it still morphs and causes things to splatter.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Z.

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste of money! Pan and blue rubber handles burnt after 4 uses.
customer_reviews.text: After using these cooking pans 4 times, the pans are already black and the blue rubber handles are completely burnt/black/broken. I wish I could return them but it’s already too late. DO NOT waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Cordova

customer_reviews.title: Pan is rusting, everything sticks
customer_reviews.text: Less than a year these pans are ready for trash. For the first couple weeks, the pans were non-stick and easy to clean. Did not last too long. Everything sticks. I hate cooking with these pans because they are so difficult to clean and they drip rust everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Eleven

customer_reviews.title: If you are decorating  your  kitchen they're fine.
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used one it left stains on it. They curled up in oven. They look pretty but there are so many that others that don't warp and stain the first time you use them.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Wills

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: They arrived and was exited to start baking. First time in the oven and pan twisted and bowed. Item was returned the next day
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good set!
customer_reviews.text: I love these cookie sheets. They’re easy to clean, I’ve not had an issue with anything sticking and they different sizes are great. However, not long after I got them I accidentally dropped one, maybe close to a two foot drop and it bent the bigger sheet on either side. Not a huge issue, but it wasn’t a high drop and I was surprised it bent like it did. They feel sturdier than that. It’s still usable, just has two small imperfections on it that drive my ocd crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Easily stained
customer_reviews.text: I got these plans specifically for baking some holiday cookies. I baked a batch of sugar cookies and a batch of ginger snaps. The bottom of the tray is stained from where the cookies sat. Very disappointing. The bottom of the pan really crisps, possibly too much. I wouldn't recommend them for baking cookies.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley DeYot

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for me
customer_reviews.text: These are not non-stick, I have to soak them to remove any food. They stained on the first use and burn the bottom of almost everything. These require me to constantly adjust cook times & temps and babysit the oven. I do not recommend, would not buy them again, and wish I bought something else.
customer_reviews.author: ted

customer_reviews.title: Great cookie sheets!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these cookie sheets! They are thick and solid and include rubber on the handles for extra grip and to keep you from burning yourself through crappy oven mitts :) Love that they come in color choices to match decor and three sizes for varying needs. Bought these for myself, but I'd buy for someone else as a gift as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer V.

customer_reviews.title: Nice baking sheets
customer_reviews.text: I like these because they are deeper than other baking sheets I have previously used, which is nice to help prevent spilling. The handles are wider and easier to grasp to pick up out of the oven. They are easy to clean and store as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nonstick works great
customer_reviews.text: Very nice nonstick jelly roll baking pans. They're a bit on the small size even as a set but they work great for their intended purpose. I'm not used to having the pronounced handles on the ends as my last ones didn't have them. May be a good thing for some people though.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous1

customer_reviews.title: Rhubarb is NOT a dessert!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a quality baking pan to set my boat engine parts on while i deep clean they with acid. These do the trick nicely. Then I can bake some tarts on them afterwards. Bottom line - Tarts tarts good for your heart, the more you eat the more you fart.
customer_reviews.author: jeff frederick

customer_reviews.title: Well Made, Quality Kitchen Tool
customer_reviews.text: Love these baking sheets, but can only use the small and medium in my oven. The large one was too wide to fit what I thought was an average size oven. That said the two I kept are fabulous and I use them all the time. Very easy to clean. deeper than the average baking sheet and nice heavy pan.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great pans - easy to clean and are holding up!
customer_reviews.text: These replaced our old, rusty cookie sheets and I should have replaced them years earlier. They are so easy to clean, any spills wipe right up. I do put them in the dishwasher (not sure if you are supposed to or not). We ordered a brownie pan too! These are really great pans.
customer_reviews.author: Racheli

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I bought the set of 3 pans 8 weeks ago. They’re horrible!!! They cleaned good the 1st 2 times. Now I’m ready to put them in the trash. I’ve tried 4 times to get in contact with the Rachael ray hotline.. i was in Homs for 40 mins to an hour each time. I want a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Zambrano

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of money
customer_reviews.text: These pans are horrible. Non-stick coating is worthless. Rubber grips are practically falling out.
customer_reviews.author: Ed K

customer_reviews.title: cheap exposed steel
customer_reviews.text: I have found in using and washing these pans that there must be exposed un-coated steel in & under the lip or crimp around the edges of these pans. Water stays in there and then drips rusty "YUCKY" water all over my counter and drain board. I would not have expected this quality issue from a celebrity chef who I supposed would test & oversee all manufacturing steps. Guess I was wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Linda O.

customer_reviews.title: Seriously awesome pans!
customer_reviews.text: I own many pieces of bakeware in the Yum-O (what a stupid name) line and the nonstick finish cannot be beat. The dark finish actually does allow for a decent amount of browning - which is a nice feature - but they still clean up like a dream. I've had cheese, sugar, chocolate and a bunch of other stuff melt or burn on one of these and every single time they come clean with practically zero effort. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Alli Holstrom

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these cookie sheet pans! I can’t say enough a good things about them. 3 great sizes. Replace your old nasty pans with these today, you will so excited to use them like me - each and every time (also doesn’t hurt that orange is my fave color)
customer_reviews.author: DMarieReid

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to order these baking sheets but unfortunately they kind of suck. The coating is chipping off at he medium sized pan even though I hand wash only. The large pan cake with a dent in it which is also starting to flake off the coating. I would not recommend these at all.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Rachael Ray can do no wrong
customer_reviews.text: At least not in the bakeware department. These are great, just like all the other bakeware and pots she's come out with. I do like the silicone grips, even though I'm not reaching in to grab them without a potholder, it's still a nice feature that can be used when the pans cool down some.
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. Coating flakes off. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: I have only used these twice. The bake and clean great. The pans are sturdy. I used parchment and silicone baking mats, no metal utensils used. However the coating started coming off in the corners of the baking pans. No food made its way into the corners. Would not recommend or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Conley

customer_reviews.title: Get these if you love to bake
customer_reviews.text: These cookie sheets are great. I have used them for cooking multiple things, not just cookies. The truly wonderful part are they are a snap to clean. Run them under a little soapy water and rinse. Everything just rinses off easily.
customer_reviews.author: April N Paris

customer_reviews.title: Hidden Rust
customer_reviews.text: When I received these they looked good, I used them, and then put them in the dishwasher. All three pans had rust underneath the side lips where you can't see it. When I took it out of the dishwasher the rust water collected in the side lips (they're very small and you can't into them) and dripped all over the place. I can't return them because I've already used them, plus you wouldn't be able to tell unless you took them out of the package. Don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alexhill

customer_reviews.title: Love these pans!
customer_reviews.text: My pan set was getting really old and gross, so I decided on this one and I'm not disappointed. Looks great, the variety of sizes is useful too. I've baked cookies and roasted chicken in these and the results were perfect. Affordable and quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look great but
customer_reviews.text: when will someone ever design one of these that doesn't rust and then trap and leak the rusty water after just a couple uses? was also somewhat surprised and disappointed that it is very hard to clean. While these look better than our old ones, we're glad we didn't throw away our old ones, because we use those now, and they work and clean better than these.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Maginity

customer_reviews.title: Bought before and Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: We love these pans! We bought the full pots/pans set a few times now but just wanted extra pans. They are the exact same as the sets - not a knock off. They hold up so well! Also, this set has the smallest pan and I really enjoy the size. Very nice to make a quick small entree and not take up a whole large pan to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Better Products Elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I needed to replace old ones. I washed them with soap and water. Dryed them and stored them. I used them for the first time and was happy that it truly was "non-stick" BUT then I had to wash them and there is a grim that will not wash off!! Never again will I buy another product from this company. Do NOT waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent save for one thing
customer_reviews.text: They are non stick and they do perform well ... but due to size, largest one is almost impossible to wash in the dishwasher unless you are willing not to wash, say, the utensils in the utensil rack.
customer_reviews.author: barney84

customer_reviews.title: Love these pans! Sturdy! Mine didn't warp.
customer_reviews.text: I love my pans! I had them with the orange handles bit wqs switching my color scheme and got the agave color. I've had the agave handled ones for over a year and use them often. Not one problem! No warping. I've used them up to 450°. Non-stick is still in perfect condition. Only issue I'm having is I'm trying to figure out how to get cooked on grease off without messing up the non-stick.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Dellinger

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it is to clean but not happy at all about the sturdiness. Just started using them and they are already warping in 400 degrees. Can't see how this pan would make it in 500 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Labrada

customer_reviews.title: Rust-free and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace our baking sheets recently and were looking for rust-free new ones. We have had these a few months and so far so good! I love the rubber grips on the handles and they cook evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Chandi

customer_reviews.title: Great baking pans
customer_reviews.text: Really nice, sturdy, baking pans with a super-slick coating that allows my cookies to slide right off. Really like how easy it is to clean them up and the silicone handles come in very handy. Have bought several sets now.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Wood

customer_reviews.title: A baker's must have!!
customer_reviews.text: Best cookie/ baking sheets ever! Nothing sticks, not even melted cheese! I no longer use baking spray or shortening to grease these. And, talk about quick clean up, just a simple wipe and rinse! honestly you won't find a better baking tool 😊 very, very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Delia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, tough, resilient and slippery
customer_reviews.text: I love these sheet pans. They look like new even after a few months because they are made so much better than cheaper, inferior pans. Definitely buy them, they are durable and I love having three different sizes. All three fit in a normal oven. Only the smallest one will fit in a toaster oven.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew McGinley (real name™)

customer_reviews.title: No Stuck On Food
customer_reviews.text: Food slides right off these pans and they are really easy to clean, however they stain VERY easily. Two of three have been stained from roasting vegetables with olive oil and seasoning. It has been quite disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Non sticking won’t last long
customer_reviews.text: The non sticking worked incredibly well for the first five times, now it works as if there was non sticking feature on all three of the pans. We have washed by hand to preserve the quality of the pans but even with such care the pans just don’t resist the use.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Fernandes

customer_reviews.title: First impressions not the best
customer_reviews.text: I give this product a solid 'meh' rating because from a celebrity chef, I was expecting better. Before using them for the first time, I ran them through the dishwasher and I noticed that some water got trapped in the handles and was leaking orange tinted water that stained my counter. Annoyance #2 came when I was using them for the first time. The pans warped from the heat of the oven ... but flattened out once cooled. On the positive side, my food cooked evenly, which at the end of the day is what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Elissa

customer_reviews.title: These pans suck.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I'd have read other reviews before buying these, they warp under heat and say they're rated at 500 degrees this was 375... this is within a week of owning them. I ordered replacements even though it went back to normal but now wishing I would've just done the refund option seeing that this isn't just a problem with the pan I was using but ALL of them.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item after reading the copious reviews. Used once and the teflan coating come off. This is while I was hand washing the pan...
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: Baking sheets
customer_reviews.text: I was gifted similar set for my wedding many years ago. So when my friend moved to a new house, I figure this will be a nice house warming gift. The rubber thingy at the end is nice for grip and overall look. My friend said she really like the set too.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: pan
customer_reviews.text: The pans will will work well--two of them will. The third won't. It's 20 inches long and won't fit the oven. It said 17 inches long on label; howevr, with the handles it is 20 inches wide.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Bertoncelj

customer_reviews.title: They can stain
customer_reviews.text: I've used these to roast vegetables (in olive oil and sprinkled with salt and curry powder). They ended up staining the sheets in yellow blotches. Soap and water don't help; moderate scrubbing doesn't seem to work either. Not sure if these sheets are just susceptible to staining, but my old (other branded) sheets never had this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product
customer_reviews.text: This is high quality at a low price. Very easy to clean, stuff doesn't stick to the pan. They are sturdy and don't bend under pressure. Very good and top of line product.
customer_reviews.author: dylan tylus

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Used item for the first time today. Larger pan arrived dented. I also noticed while using the middle pan it warped while in the oven but did go back to correct form once pan cooled down.
customer_reviews.author: CrazyBusyBella

customer_reviews.title: Pans warp with force while cooking! Food flies!
customer_reviews.text: Update: all the pans have warped at this point. 2 returned to the original shape but they warp so badly in the oven...you can actually hear them popping from the other room. They pop with such force that in one case some potatoes o'brian we were cooking for breakfast flew all over the inside of the oven. Initially I loved these pans but after baking chicken breasts at 400 degrees one pan totally warped mid cook and will not return to the original shape.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Great for roasting & baking
customer_reviews.text: I use these daily, sometimes more than one for the same meal. This is a great set. Roast some veggies in the big one, bake some fish or chicken in a smaller one. Get really wild and use all 3 - maybe some sweet potatoes? Who cares. Just do it. Cook stuff. You won't regret it. Unless you're a terrible cook, but even if you burn something these will probably be easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Hands down best bake pans! I give these away as gifts to all my friends and family and they love them too! Do not use and sprays or oils on them and they will last! They are really non stick and super east to clean. They come in a variety of colors. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loveeee them
customer_reviews.text: We have used these a lot and as long as you know what you are doing, they hold up just fine. Ours hasn't warped or lost any discoloration. Not sure why other reviews have said this. But we love them and you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cruelladevilmua

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pans
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic pans. They are very easy to clean and the three different sizes provide a nice variety. They have a nice weight to them and they aren't flimsy. These are a definite must have as basic pans. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Casey M. Keathley

customer_reviews.title: Oh Wow...
customer_reviews.text: These baking sheets are fabulous. Everything you want in a baking sheet....Cookies come out terrific...and I make Chicken Jerky for dog treats and no spilling in the oven. Great quality product. Way to go Rachel Ray....
customer_reviews.author: raindancer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these backing sheets
customer_reviews.text: Best quality baking sheets I've ever owned. You know you're getting old when you get excited over new baking sheets. These are wonderful though and I loved how easy they fit in my hand when I take them out of the oven and the are super easy to clean. Definitely worth the price and will buy more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: From day 1 the non stick was worthless. Should be called stick. I have olive oil that is baked into the pan. Even a sos pad won't get it out. Always warp when get hot. Useless
customer_reviews.author: Danvanstang

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive, easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I’d taken a photo of the nasty burnt on crud left on these pans after baking a recent dinner. My wife commented that this must be the end of these pans. Well I got to work with the ol brush and water and the burnt on crud was all washed off before I even put soap on the pans. I already liked them, but after that I had to write a review. They do need to be hand washed, but it’s well worth it, they come clean nice and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Meteorologist

customer_reviews.title: I'm saving so much money
customer_reviews.text: For the life of my marriage, we have had the cheap Walmart cookie sheets. My wife insists on a layer of foil every time she uses them. Do you know how expensive foil can get?! I bought her these for Christmas, mostly as a joke. We DON'T NEED FOIL. I can clean these off simply by running water over the surface (I still use soap of course)!!! I am beyond pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great non stick surface
customer_reviews.text: I've only had these for a few weeks but first impression is that they are great. Excellent non stick surface and seem to be great so far. Just hope they last a while!
customer_reviews.author: Ben C.

customer_reviews.title: Great pans!
customer_reviews.text: I love the sturdiness of these pans and especially love the rubber handles as the pan surfaces are very slick. I can't comment on durability as yet since I've used them only a handful of times.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Musser

customer_reviews.title: Love this pans set
customer_reviews.text: Me and the wife love these I used the jelly pan for a pumpkin roll and it came out perfect my wife used the big one for cookies they slide right off no problem
customer_reviews.author: THEODORE MALPEZZI JR

customer_reviews.title: Need More
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe how easy these are to clean! Without cooking spray nothing sticks.Now if only I could find a 10" skillet that worked as well
customer_reviews.author: Grandbumpy

customer_reviews.title: It’s not a boat
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect gift for your significant other. When I got these for my wife she knew it meant I love you and get in that kitchen and cook.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Would be perfect if water didn't accumulate in the rolled edges
customer_reviews.text: Love the heft of these. On my second set. They kinda rust on the inside of the edges. It's a bit of a pain shaking out the excess water, but this are very good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: fixit

customer_reviews.title: Best Pans Ever
customer_reviews.text: I placed a layer of bacon on the pan and layered pork chops, veggies and more bacon on top. Covered the meal with foil and put it on the outside grill. Forgot and left it on for two hours! When I opened it up everything was burned black to a crisp. Thought I would have to throw the pan out. Everything slid off of it with just a little soaking. Bottom of the pan was like new. Would purchase these again or buy them as a gift for someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Kamps

customer_reviews.title: Hand wash only
customer_reviews.text: The bottom edge of the roll metal will rust in the dishwasher. No other rust but on that bottom edge. Was dripping brown water after the first time in the dishwasher. Just hand wash and dry well to prevent rust. The silicone handles are a little small to try to handle straight out of the oven.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. Daigle

customer_reviews.title: HANDLES MAKE IT HARD TO FIT IN OVEN
customer_reviews.text: HANDLES MAKE IT HARD TO FIT IN OVEN. I MEASURED SIZES BEFORE PURCHASING. USED SMALL PAN FIRST VERY HAPPY WITH THAT BUT THEN WHEN I USED THE SECOND SIZE IT ACTUALLY GOT STUCK IN THE OVEN. USED SPATULA TO GET ITEMS OFF PAN. I HAD TURN OFF OVEN AND WAIT FOR IT COOL SO I COULD GET PAN OUT. THIRD PAN I CANNOT USE AT ALL. I HAD ALREADY USED TWO OF THE PANS I CANNOT RETURN THE SET. I WILL KEEP THE SMALLEST PAN. I AM TRYING TO FIND SOME WHO HAS AN OVEN WHERE THE OTHER 2 PANS WOULD FIT. VERY DISAPPOINTED IN THE PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: What's not to love?
customer_reviews.text: They bake cookies, pizza, and roasted veggies without a single drop of no-stick spray. They clean like a dream, dry quickly, and fit compactly for storage. This is my new favorite addition to my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this JUNK!!!
customer_reviews.text: Trashhhh!!! No matter how hard you press, how long you wait, it's NEVER going to sit flush. Super disappointed, this is the 3rd tempered glass I buy with the SAME horrible results.👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼
customer_reviews.author: Joon.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality baking pans
customer_reviews.text: This is an item I got my wife as a gift that she sent me the link for. She says they're great! I say the things she cooks on them taste great! That's a win win situation.
customer_reviews.author: Ezrway

customer_reviews.title: I'm keeping it
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes it slightly bends while in the oven even when it's used within the acceptable temperature range. It regains it's shape once cooled off. Hence not major concern. Everything else works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jil Kapashi

customer_reviews.title: They are strudier than I expected
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has a habit of damaging(ruining) these types of pans by either scraping the teflon coating off leaving them rusted which makes them harder to clean. These pans have been a life saver. They don't scratch easily cook evenly and can take on the pizza, french fry cookie baking terror that is a teenaged girl. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Tanisha D Jones

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I've used these pans for a little over a year now and the coating started coming off a few months after first use. The price was great but not if you have to throw them out after a year. I'm very disappointed in the quality of these pans.
customer_reviews.author: mwhite

product_meta.title: Rachael Ray Nonstick Bakeware Set with Grips, Nonstick Cookie Sheets / Baking Sheets - 3 Piece, Gray with Orange Grips
product_meta.description: Color:Gray with Orange GripsOffering three popular-sized baking pans, the Rachael Ray Yum-o! Nonstick Bakeware 3-Piece Oven Lovin' Cookie Pan Set is ideal for making both savory and sweet treats. These cookie pans are made from heavy gauge steel that are warp resistant and feature long-lasting nonstick that provides excellent food release and easy cleanup. The cookie pans' bold-colored, extra-wide grippy handles provide a confident grasp when pulling items from the oven, and are oven safe to 500°F. As an added bonus, a portion of the proceeds from this bakeware set purchase goes to Yum-o!, Rachael's nonprofit organization that helps kids and their parents develop healthy relationships with food and cooking. Hit a sweet or savory triple play with the Rachael Ray Yum-o! Nonstick Bakeware 3-Piece Oven Lovin' Cookie Pan Set that includes three durable pans for creating delish baked foods.
feature_bullets: Durable bakeware set: These cookie pans are made from heavy gauge steel that resists warping to keep you baking, roasting and toasting for years
Versatile cookie sheets: Long-lasting nonstick cookie sheets provide excellent food release when baking, roasting, etc and provides an easy cleanup
Handles the heat: bold-colored, extra-wide grippy handles on the pans provide a confident grasp while taking the baking pans out of the oven where they are oven safe to 500 degrees Fahrenheit
Feel good bakeware: A portion of the proceeds goes to Yum-o, Rachael’s nonprofit that helps kids and parents develop healthy relationships with food
Set includes: 9-Inch by 13-Inch cookie sheet, 10-Inch by 15-Inch cookie sheet and 11-Inch by 17-Inch cookie sheet for baking sweet and savory recipes

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars6,711 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
